argumentText:
ARGUMENT
n x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_df-chp | |- psi = ( x e. RR |-> sum_ n e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` x ) ) ( Lam ` n ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_fzfid | |- ( x e. RR -> ( 1 ... ( |_ ` x ) ) e. Fin ) |
| 3 |  | #P_elfznn | |- ( n e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` x ) ) -> n e. NN ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( x e. RR /\ n e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` x ) ) ) -> n e. NN ) |
| 5 |  | #P_vmacl | |- ( n e. NN -> ( Lam ` n ) e. RR ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_syl | |- ( ( x e. RR /\ n e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` x ) ) ) -> ( Lam ` n ) e. RR ) |
| 7 | 2, 6 | #P_fsumrecl | |- ( x e. RR -> sum_ n e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` x ) ) ( Lam ` n ) e. RR ) |
| 8 | 1, 7 | #P_fmpti | |- psi : RR --> RR |
